Rulings.Base: 1. This effect starts a Chain. Removing the monster from play is a cost.\n2. You can also activate this effect when your monster that your opponent controls is destroyed by battle and sent to your GY. The monster has to be a LIGHT monster on the field as well as in the GY in order to activate the effect of "The Fountain in the Sky".\n3. You cannot activate the effect of "The Fountain in the Sky" when a monster with 0 ATK is sent to the GY.
